# Simbologia e notações{.unnumbered}


**ARMA** - Autoregressive–moving-average; \

**ARCH** - Autoregressive conditional heteroscedasticity; \

**CMP** - Capital market line; \

**DEaR** - Daily Value at Risk; \

**EWMA** - Exponentially Weighted Moving Average (EWMA); \

**EGARC** - Exponential generalized autoregressive conditional heteroscedastic; \

**GARCH** - Generalized autoregressive conditional heteroskedasticity; \

**VaR** - Value at Risk; \

**VI** - Volatilidade Implícita; \
